creator: lkarpel@eloquent.com
text:
Tou can use the <Manager> setting in your server.xml to change the 'pathname' 
value .. but there is no way to disable the feature .. by setting pathname to 
null.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Setting "pathname" to null (the actual Java null) does that. However, an empty
String is not mapped as null by the digester, so an extra check is needed.
